entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: Invalid optimization of (-1 * -A) + A #61077
  • Memory allocation in .NET fails at 70% of the container limit when running in Kubernetes #61076
  • Assertion failed '!parentStruct->lvUndoneStructPromotion' during 'Mark local vars' #61074
  • ReadyToRun + PublishSingleFile=true: Possibility to specify compression codec and compression level #61073
  • [wasm] Surface errors from `emcc --version`, like missing python #61067
  • [DllImportGenerator] Fix inconsistencies in signature of updated p/invokes #61062
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests - Maximum call stack size exceeded #61061
    7.0.0
  • system.io.pipelines sample that shows server responding to data that client is sending #61060
  • [Nethost/Hostfxr] Hosting: How to get runtime to probe application folder #61059
  • [Wasm][AOT] Precompilation fails using Syncfusion.Blazor.dll #61053
  • Supported Versions in SslStream #61051
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_16833/Test16833/Test16833.sh #61050
    7.0.0

Closed

  • JIT: Invalid optimization of (-1 * -A) + A #61078
  • Revisit BrotliStream CompressionLevel values #46595
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Discarded cast on RHS of assignment leads to missing sign extension #60597
    7.0.0
  • Constant pool should share values #35268
    Future
  • dotnet publish fails when RunAOTCompilation is set to true #60274
    7.0.0
  • Add ToList(capacity) and ToDictionary(capacity) to System.Linq.Enumerable #29620
    Future
  • dotnet support android sdk, runtime #61031
  • Suggestions: Add .UniqueOrDefault() to handle multiple occurrences without Exception #29398
    Future
  • Feature Request: .ToDictionary overload for IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<IKey,IValue>> returning Dictionary<IKey,IValue> #24900
    Future
  • LINQ performance of .Where(pred).Any() against .Any(pred) #53274
    Future
  • Dotnet doesn't run apps from /tmp on Linux #59280
  • DOTNET_ROLL_FORWARD=Major ignores in new builds of .net 6 since preview 7 #58754
    7.0.0
  • LINQ SelectAggregate #26945
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add TrySelect #59463
    Future
  • Linux: NativeLibrary.TryGetExport terminates the process when handle parameter does not a real handle to library. #60758
    7.0.0
  • Consume PosixSignal in Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Systemd's SystemdLifetime #56058
    7.0.0
  • Proposal: Non-generic IReadOnlyDictionary interface #28402
    Future
  • [Question] Why no Task<bool> for SemaphoreSlim WaitAsync (System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) #61052
  • [wasm][debugger] Evaluate testList[0] #60340
  • Exception when adding multiple PolicyHandlers to IHttpClientBuilder #61056

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix x86 stackwalk for UnmanagedCallersOnly #61075
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] simplify startup configuration #61072
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix inconsistency in p/invoke arguments introduced when switching some to be blittable #61071
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Avoid bogus cred scanning hits #61070
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • revert 58594 CacheCredential change #61069
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add Maui iOS and MacCatalyst build steps #61068
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix refcount when a composite r2r image is loaded from a bundle #61066
    area-Single-File
  • Adding support for X86Base.Pause() and ArmBase.Yield() #61065
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add TFM and version support query to marshaller interface. #61064
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix dump generation issues for VS4Mac #61063
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Check yml conditions in xplat-setup #61055
  • Make WeakReferenceCollection thread safe #61054
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution

Merged

  • Validate CompressionLevel value is defined in BrotliStream ctor #57561
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix 60597 by using genActualType #61057
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Delete duplicate test projects #61024
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • support loading versioned libmsquic #61021
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Updating named mutex design docs #60246
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Consume PosixSignal in Hosting.Systemd's SystemdLifetime #59880
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix various dump generation issues for VS4Mac #60995
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix for #60340 #60863
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging blazor app after ts changes. #60873
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Disable implicit tailcalls for throwhelpers #61006
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Seed the unified System.Security.Cryptography.dll #61025
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Add linux x86 build CI for pull request #60817
    * NO MERGE *, community-contribution
  • Make QCalls respect the EntryPoint property #60992
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Use SIMD operations in genCodeForInitBlkUnroll and increase INITBLK_UNROLL_LIMIT to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [arm64] JIT: Recognize sbfiz/ubfiz idioms #61045
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [arm64] JIT: Fix IsContainableImmed for arm64 v8.1 or higher #61035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Some VN refactoring #61034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [arm64] JIT: Fold "A * B + C" to MADD/MSUB #61037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #60988
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono] Add mono_class_get_special_jit_flags and MONO_SPECIAL_JIT_DEFER_CLASS_INIT_TO_CTOR #60987
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable ASAN for CoreCLR #54580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update SDK to 6.0 RC2 #60256
    area-Infrastructure
  • Request CachePolicy isn't applied in HTTP request header #60913
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Fix: Incorrect order of checks for TypeBuilder `GetConstructor` and `GetField` method #53645
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Arm64: addressing modes #61026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • Obsolete thumbtacked AssemblyName properties #59522
    area-System.Reflection, needs more info, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix GetType called on ptr constrained to Nullable` #61020
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Guarded Devirt: multiple type checks #59604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Optimize ReadOnlyTernaryTree for System.Private.Xml #60076
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • CI matrix change: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 - Second attempt #60054
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60561
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.1
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add unit test for variable length encoding HTTP/3 #60766
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Optimization for left-shift operator #52297
    needs more info, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix time-of-use vs. time-of-check "bugs" #60860
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
